name: New Russian Republic
startIntroPart2: You, President Alexi Nvalny, are the leader of the Republic of Russia.  After winning the civil war and deposing Vladimir Putin, you must now lead your nation to prosperity!
declaringWar: You have crossed Russia one too many times. Now, prepare to be destroyed like the you have. never seen before
attacked: Your army fighting my army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. After we win the war, you will be exiled, and forced to live away from any civilization, as an outcast.
defeated: We may have fallen, but the Motherland will still crush you.
introduction: Hello. I am President Alexi Nvalny, of Russia.  I welcome you to the Motherland.  Would you like to play a game of poker?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
